content: {A挠头}Hoho! Everyone's preparing dishes for the dinner party, and even those who can't cook are pitching in to find ingredients.
info: 制作美食-莫白闲聊_主流程文本II

content: I can smell the aroma of mushroom soup!{A灵光一现} Hoho! The others will be arriving shortly for the meal!
info: 制作美食-莫白闲聊_主流程文本II

content: How about this? Try learning the recipe and <style=Highlight>gather the ingredients</style> to make some <style=Highlight>Mushroom Soup</style> at the Cooking Counter, and bring it to share at the meal.
info: 制作美食-莫白闲聊_主流程文本II
